website_summaries.verdict: Stylish, comfortable, and versatile, these jazz shoes will hold up through multiple rehearsals.
pros: Men’s sizes are accurate to street shoe sizes and manufacturer’s size chart
cons: Soles will wear through after a few weeks of rehearsal and performance

customer_reviews.title: But these are good quality shoes
customer_reviews.text: Never danced before. But these are good quality shoes. Very well manufactured. My feet are comfortable while messing up each and every step for two hours each lesson. The ladies in the class were amazed that I found a size to fit my size 14 flippers I have as feet. I got the 19M. They were a bit tight at first but after about 10hours they fit perfect and are very comfortable. Too bad they don't teach my feet to be in the right place at the right time. I gave it 4 stars because I had to secure some seams to withstand my 233lb frame.. These poor shoes are gonna take such punishment.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: New favorite dance shoes
customer_reviews.text: New favorite west coast swing practice shoes! It’s like dancing in socks (without the holes in your socks and the blisters on your feet from spins). These are fabulous for practicing or social dancing. My “proper” west coast shoes either make my toes go numb and blister my heels (heeled sandals) or turn my big toe into a giant bruise and blister my heel (men’s/unisex shoes). These are sweet relief. Especially for weekend events where I’m dancing for 16 hours a day!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Mcdaid

customer_reviews.title: The best for Newsies!
customer_reviews.text: I used these for a production of Newsies and they were wonderful!!! The heel comes away from your foot, which is a bit odd, but they did the job. With heavy wear and excessive dancing they do wear holes in the toes, and on the sides, but the double layer of canvas prevented my foot from meeting the stage. I was able to die them brown with Rit Dye, but had to color the rubber with Sharpies and paint pens, and replace the shoe laces with black ones. Other than that, they lasted for about 3 months with heavy dancing. They are wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Jazzy Shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are dance shoes, I wouldn't expect arch support. I purchased them because they resemble extant boots from the 1840s. I needed appropriate shoes for my Dickens Fair costume and these couldn't be more perfect. Taking in all the reviews, I ordered a 13M--I usually wear a 7W in mens' shoes. I measured my foot length with a ruler and added a bit for the width, and they are perfect. I am looking forward to breaking them in and the Fair!
customer_reviews.author: Goodwich

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price paid...Not expensive craftmanship either though, just a good value. I cannot really complain. Do order wayyyyyy larger than your street shoe. I usually wear 8.5 to a 9, ordered 10 and fits like a glove. Allow width to be a real consideration also, I am never a W but the M fits me almost narrow like. Just a forewarning.
customer_reviews.author: Lars'

customer_reviews.title: Great product, poor sizing
customer_reviews.text: The sizing of these shoes are extremely poor! I have no idea what chart they use! My daughter wears a size 6.5 so I purchased the 7 and paid for overnight shipping. Three purchases later (overnight shipping) we ended up with a size 10!! She needed them for a musical. I even measured her foot with a ruler and used the sizing chart and that didn't work! We probably could have used the 11, but ran out of time. Thank goodness for free returns! Otherwise, the product is great for school productions and exactly what she was required to purchase and priced much better than anything we could find locally.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Wow...
customer_reviews.text: You know when you order something and you just hope and pray that they'll be as good as you expect? Mine weren't. They were 300 times better. I'll be slaying in my jazz class. So stylish and so beatiful. Absolutely love and would purchase again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Wyatt Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Good Basic Shoe, Runs Small
customer_reviews.text: This shoe runs at least two sizes smaller than street shoe size. My daughter wears a women's size 10, and the size 12 fits just right. She says they're comfortable, but she commented on the lack of arch support. She's had them a week and is enjoying rehearsing in them for a civic theatre production. They do not look like they are made to last, but should serve her fine for the couple of months she will need them.
customer_reviews.author: IMHO

customer_reviews.title: Be warned
customer_reviews.text: My daughter just received her shoes, so excited to try them on and try them out. So she danced around our bedroom, I can't believe it, they stained the carpet with black blue ink stains! I have never had a pair of dance shoes do this. Did they use paint to color the soles? We are trying to get the stain out of the carpet but so far nothing is helping. I am so disappointed. Soho, please see this and change the way you color the soles or change what the soles are made of.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha S.

customer_reviews.title: Good for price
customer_reviews.text: I added insoles to these and they are much more comfortable. The size was pretty accurate. For the price, they are nice dancing shoes, but the fabric gets dirty easy. I have to wipe them off a lot because things stick to them. I might try the leather version next.
customer_reviews.author: JustReviewin'

customer_reviews.title: They work for what we needed
customer_reviews.text: Good fit, just need to make sure to translate the size properly to find men's size 10. Wasn't straight forward. My son needed these for a high school musical he was in (some stage dancing and jumping involved). They worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Keepin-it-Simple

customer_reviews.title: BEST QUALITY but NOT TRUE TO SIZE
customer_reviews.text: Canvas and make of the shoe is a really great quality. I am size 8 in women's; I ended up buying 3 sizes (9M, 10M and 11M) and returned 2 of them. The 10 M US Women's/6 M US Men's fit best. I also purchased 2 other brands but the quality really was inferior to this one.
customer_reviews.author: Sherilla Nisbett

customer_reviews.title: Zumba without knee pain!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for Zumba...These are the best shoe by far for any dance. I have tried many different shoes including Zumba shoes and I was always torqueing my knees. Not any more... now I can do Zumba for two hours with no knee pain. Love these shoes the fit was about one size small for me compared to the chart I ware a mens 10 bought a 14 needed a 15. Although they are small I can still ware them and dance 10,000 steps in two hours. Will purchase again and again!
customer_reviews.author: Judy Craig

customer_reviews.title: These are really great for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are really great for the price. I bought this shoe as the same size as my street shoe and had no problems with the fit. The heel of this is a little bit firmer than I would like which makes it hard to step on in certain dances (I'm using this as a bachata practice shoe). Overall I would purcahse again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These were perfect shoes for my musical
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect shoes for my musical! I needed dance shoes that would let me spin, but I didn't want shoes that looked like they were from the 21st century. These looked perfect with my medieval costume! Make sure you pay attention to the size guide when purchasing these so you get the right size!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for ballet and jazz
customer_reviews.text: A little tight in the toes but expect to stretch with wear. Ordered 1 size bigger,Use for ballet and jazz. Light canvas material. No support but put insert in.
customer_reviews.author: chestube

customer_reviews.title: Wooden floor dancing shoes
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable dancing shores for smooth wooden floors. I have 2 pairs. It runs small I wear a size 8 1/2 I brought a size 10
customer_reviews.author: C S

customer_reviews.title: Form fitting and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Sizing for this type of shoes can be an issue. I'm a man size 10. I chose a size 11 M and it fits perfectly. I'm satisfied with the product. It's comfy and unrestrictive. I'm not sure about durability though coz I haven't used them long enough. The threads holding the leather parts of the sole are quite close to the bottom of the shoe, so I anticipate that they might let go might let go early as wear and tear sets in. I give it a 4 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: nano

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were too small. I sent them back and with Amazon Prime it didn't cost me a dime. The larger ones were on their way before I sent the too small pair back. Love Amazon Prime. I wear a size 10 in US sizes. I reordered a size 15 and they did fit. I love them for the country dancing that I do. They are great; lightweight and slide really well.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Hill

customer_reviews.title: Great for actors!
customer_reviews.text: These were great shoes when my son was in a Shakespeare play. He normally wears an 11 street shoe, but wore a 15 & 16 in this. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: max

customer_reviews.title: Great dance shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I ended up with these 2 sizes bigger than what I normally wear, based upon reviews I read and they worked out great. I love these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Jones

customer_reviews.title: Perfect alternative
customer_reviews.text: Brought these as an alternative for teaching salsa in because of plantar fasciitis and not being able to wear heels. They are perfect!!! Very comfortable and able to wear them for multiple classes. They are made small and had to go up a size and a half but fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Beana Rogers

customer_reviews.title: On second pair, better than first, and takes a beating.
customer_reviews.text: On my second pair, and stitching was way better than first. Will probably last longer and I beat up on these shoes through hours of rehearsal a week,
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: It's great for you ankles
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is way too flat. It provides no support. It's great for you ankles, but it feels like I'm without shoes. It's light weight, but needs a better bottom. I wear size 8 shoes. The size 13 fit perfect. I don't think the sole is going to hold out that long. The front of the shoe is breaking up after two wears.
customer_reviews.author: Dede

customer_reviews.title: I am an adult male who needed these shoes for ...
customer_reviews.text: I am an adult male who needed these shoes for dancing in a musical. They were supposed to be a size 11 men's. They were ridiculously small, so small I gave them to my daughter who is 12 years old so she could use them in her performances. I think maybe the sizes they advertise are for hobbit feet???
customer_reviews.author: Goslangios Mhetlonac

customer_reviews.title: order two sizes larger
customer_reviews.text: I needed these dance boots for a musical I was in. The shoe is great and comfortable. I like that they fold up small and take up less space in my dance bag. However they run small. I usually wear8-8.5. I've learned with dance shoes to order larger. I ordered size 10 womans and my toes went to the very edge of the shoe. I returned them for an 11. I hope this size works better. I gave the shoe a 4 because it ran small.
customer_reviews.author: Tami Heck

customer_reviews.title: Ordered twice and still too small
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 9 I could get my foot in but it was too tight. So I returned it and ordered a size 10. This time I could not even get my foot in it was even smaller than the size 9. I am not sure how that could happen. Then I forgot to return in time and now I am out $31 and still no dance shoes :-(
customer_reviews.author: stsoni

customer_reviews.title: Size way smaller
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality size is Way off. Said 12M but my toenail was hitting it and I’m a wonen’s US Street size of 9 1/2
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe! * always buy bigger size*
customer_reviews.text: Great Shoe for dance. Leather Pads allow for easy twirls. I have oredered from this company before. ALWAYS buy a bigger US size than you would normally wear. For example, I wear an 8 to 8.5 US. I bought these in a 10 and that is a perfect fir for me.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda dailey

customer_reviews.title: They do fit small, but one size up is probably a good way to go.
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a size 9 in womens (US) and based upon reviewed ordered two sizes up to get a size 11. The shoes ended up being too big and I probably should have just ordered one size up. I am planning to buy some dr. scholls sole cushion inserts and hoping that will help take up some space.
customer_reviews.author: PRB

customer_reviews.title: Great dance boot
customer_reviews.text: These are a good quality dance boot. They run a little small, but we knew that as all dance shoes do. We purchased a size 8 and our street shoe is a size 6.
customer_reviews.author: Mark E.

customer_reviews.title: WORKED GREAT FOR WHAT I NEEDED
customer_reviews.text: TORE THROUGH THESE IN ONE PRODUCTION ALREADY HAVE HOLES IN THEM. I WEAR A SIZE 11 1/2- 12 IN MENS US AND I BOUGHT 13'S AND THEY FELT A LITTLE LARGE. WORKED GREAT FOR WHAT I NEEDED THOUGH
customer_reviews.author: Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Come small
customer_reviews.text: This run on the small side. I ordered a half size up from my shoe size, and they were still snug. I wore them to try to stretch them out and wear them in, but that didn't work out so well. LOL I ended up giving them to my sister, who has a slightly smaller foot than I do. Other than the sizing issue, the shoe itself was great.
customer_reviews.author: LadyLex

customer_reviews.title: You Have to Try Them On First
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered these same shoes in the past, but they were very tight fit and I hated the way they felt after a few hours. This is the closest size I could find that wasn't too tight at all. I wear a dress shoe in a 13 and a gym shoe in a 14 and the size 20 for these were good for my shoe size.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Sorrell

customer_reviews.title: Like slippers
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, but I added generic orthotics for arch and heal support, as these are dance shoes, and I intended to wear them as casual shoes. Go 3 or 3 1/2 sizes larger than what you usually wear. I had tried on a friend's shoe and based on that I ordered a 12. I normally wear 7 1/2. I would buy them again, but in an 11.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Order TWO sizes larger!
customer_reviews.text: These are PERFECT, but order at least TWO SIZES LARGER! I'm so glad I read the reviews first. I ordered these as suggested with my fingers crossed, and they fit my daughter perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Order a size Up from Street shoe
customer_reviews.text: These are my daughter's preferred jazz boots when she needs them for a show. She wears a street shoe size 6.5/7. In Sanshas she wears their size 8.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too large
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size 12 and 14 for my daughter. Size 13 was not available at the time. The 12 was too small and the 14 too big. She takes a 9.5 street shoe. Luckily by the time I re-ordered, a 13 was available. Sizing charts are not reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Dance Mom

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the price
customer_reviews.text: You have to order above your normal shoe size. I usually wear an 11 I ordered a 13. The construction is somewhat cheap canvas and there is little padding on the inside of the sole. I had to put my own padding in. I bought mostly because I sprained my ankle and needed high top support
customer_reviews.author: B. DARE

customer_reviews.title: and overall i would recommend them.
customer_reviews.text: note: i intentionally bought these 2 sizes up (from 6 to 8) in part b/c they ran out of my size and based on other reviews. they are definitely too long, BUT i appreciate that i can wear them with athletic socks, which make them fit very well. i've used them for 2 practices so far, and overall i would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Critical customer

customer_reviews.title: Good thing as we were using them for a show ...
customer_reviews.text: We use these a lot at out studio and they fit had shown to be correct per the chart. Good thing as we were using them for a show and there was no time to do any exchanging However you cannot order by your street shoe size you must follow the size chant
customer_reviews.author: C. Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Awesome dance shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh I love these. Make my morning dance so much better! I will buy them again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Ambrosini

customer_reviews.title: Says ladies size 8 US in the title, but ...
customer_reviews.text: Says ladies size 8 US in the title, but was at least 2 sizes too small when I received it. Returned it with no problem, which is why I gave 2 stars instead of 1.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the largest they had to offer. I wear10 in a half way way too tight.
customer_reviews.author: gary

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Scarecrow in Wizard of Oz
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for Scarecrow in Wizard of Oz. Held up ALMOST thru the run. Had to use a little glue here and there, but it was ok, cuz it was the Scarecrow!
customer_reviews.author: More than a Christmas shopper

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Omg a nine was like trying to wear a size 7 shoe. I couldn't wear during dance class
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: Order at least 1 to 2 sizes larger.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these dance shoes for my nephew for his high school musical production. Was worried that they wouldn't fit...since he has a larger shoe size. Ordered 2 sizes larger to compensate for length and width like other reviews suggested. They fit perfectly and were in great condition by the end of the shows run. Would definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: As expected.
customer_reviews.text: these shoes run small. I wear a size 11 but I bought a size 13 or 14. They are excellent for dance class. They kind of look like bags a little bit on the feet though. Like old world shoes when they didn't make shoes for left and right foot. But...if you need a quick pair of flat shoes without a hight price...these will do.
customer_reviews.author: chamain bailey

customer_reviews.title: Run's Very Small
customer_reviews.text: Great quality shoe but runs very small I am a men's 13 so i ordered what was sold as a men's 13 but wound up having to reorder twice to get the size that fit which was a 16
customer_reviews.author: KCO2010

customer_reviews.title: Fine shoe, difficult sizing.
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the shoe was decent, but I had trouble with the sizing and did not use the item. I followed everyone's suggestions to order the shoes larger than advertised, but I wasn't happy with the fit. The size listed for me would have been too small, but the size I ended up with didn't fit well on the toe.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle West

customer_reviews.title: Runs very small
customer_reviews.text: The reviews warned me to get a couple sizes larger and I did, they were still small. The product is good buy order at least 3 sizes larger.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen D. Rich

customer_reviews.title: Do not fit as expected
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these and they said they were a woman's 12 but they were so small I could not even try them on.
customer_reviews.author: David & Ann Courcy

customer_reviews.title: Solid dance shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great dance shoe! Fits as expected if you follow their size chart. I love these!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I liked them for contra dancing but they didn't last very long.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Trofimova

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful quality and look
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful quality and look. They do run a bit small, as others mentioned. Just order a size up and they will be great!
customer_reviews.author: heidi l.

customer_reviews.title: I ordered a size 9 after reading other reviews and ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size 9 after reading other reviews and I normally wear a 6.5. Length wise I have a little bit of space at the toes and the shoe feels a little big on my feet. I think next time I would order a size 8. But I can wear it with socks to fill in the extra room.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Buy a larger size than what you wear, because it runs small.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Ishida

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, in fact this is my 3rd pair in 5 years. I also have several of the other colors. Even though these are designed for a dance floor I wear them outside in sometimes rough ground.
customer_reviews.author: sgillott

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: Normal shoe size is 10.5. Purchased a 18m. Good fit.
customer_reviews.author: MontiQ

customer_reviews.title: Great for theater-sizes run small.
customer_reviews.text: Had to return twice, because sizes run 2 sizes too small. Im normally a 10, had to order a 12. But love them!
customer_reviews.author: Angelique Novie

customer_reviews.title: Have been searching high and low for GREAT Jazz shoes that will not fall apart after 2 ...
customer_reviews.text: Have been searching high and low for GREAT Jazz shoes that will not fall apart after 2 practices. I purchased these for my daughter and she LOVES them!!!! Said they are super comfortable and it's been so great to rehearse with shoes that aren't hurting her feet and falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Indoor shoes
customer_reviews.text: These would be washable in the machine. They are so high that you must pull up the laces in order to get it on your foot. Very comfortable but not for walking outside, has a thin sole.
customer_reviews.author: Dance with me

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is waaaaaay off
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a half size higher (i usually wear and 8.5 but ordered a 9) and it is way too small...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: they are doing just great.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. After a quick break-in period, they are doing just great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them and enjoying dancing
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous shoes. Love them and enjoying dancing. My size is 8.5 and I ordered 13. Feets perfect. I dance in this shoes for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Lana

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a musical
customer_reviews.text: This shoe was absolutely perfect for my son's lead in his high school musical production of the Wizard of Oz. He had to do a lot of dancing and falling as the Scarecrow. This shoe looked perfect and was comfortable. It was also a good price. I ordered 1 size up after looking at some other reviews and was glad I did. If he were going to wear them longer than for the two weeks the show runs, I think he would even need one size bigger--his toes are almost to the end of the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: hlonda

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart after less than a week.
customer_reviews.text: The bottom shoe piece is already coming off and I’ve had them less than a week. Kinda disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Recommend 100%
customer_reviews.text: They run small I'm an 8 in shoes had to order an 11 but totally worth it since you can adjust how they fit since they're laced. totally recommend this product ...easy to clean and are durable not to mention very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: M. Godinez

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes :)
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed these. True to size! They were very easy to break in and are a delight to dance in.
customer_reviews.author: Ismael Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Dancing!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to wear to a Pirate Mardi Gras Ball. They fit like a glove and were very, very comfortable. I danced most of the night in these and they were great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE DANCE SHOES! ORDER THREE SIZES LARGER
customer_reviews.text: IF YOU ORDER 3 SIZED LARGER YOU WILL BE FINE! I LOVE THESE SHOES... HAVE THEM IN 3 COLORS USUALLY A 9 ORDERED 12 16 IN AUSTRAILIAN SIZE
customer_reviews.author: D. Goldberg

customer_reviews.title: Love the dancing shoes; order several sizes larger.
customer_reviews.text: I wear a women's 10.5 shoe and ordered a size 14. They fit very well. I love the heel height and ankle support. Will order another pair in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: RW Reader

customer_reviews.title: Too large
customer_reviews.text: I took the advise on previous review, I normally wear size 7 & I ordered size 10 as advised. It was too big. I think I maybe able to wear size 9? I wish I could wear it for my dance class as I planned. It looked very well made & comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Ping Lee

customer_reviews.title: they didn't look nice as I hoped
customer_reviews.text: they didn't look nice as I hoped, but they worked for what my child needed in a production of Oklahoma.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Always a good fit, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Sansha is my go to Jazz Shoes. Always a good fit, good quality, and a good price.
customer_reviews.author: ericka

customer_reviews.title: I bought 1 size up for ladies as recommended - fit perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I bought 1 size up for ladies as recommended - fit perfectly. Not really for arch support - for dance.
customer_reviews.author: MLG

customer_reviews.title: I ordered two sizes up like everyone else had suggested
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two sizes up like everyone else had suggested. I feel like the shoes are a half size- full size too big. Canvas stretches as you wear it.
customer_reviews.author: Eddy

customer_reviews.title: I love my dance shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love my dance shoes! They're comfy and flexible. The only downside was the sizing I wear a 9.5 and I thought a 10 would be enough...nope I had to get a 12.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rockin Jazz boots!
customer_reviews.text: Love these jazz boots! Just got them today, read the reviews before buying, and saw that they run small.I am a size 9 in womens and I ordered a size 12 and they fit perfectly. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Chi

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: very happy with this shoe; had to order one size larger then I normally do. nicely made...very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: gigi

customer_reviews.title: Just a little small
customer_reviews.text: They are great shoes and they look awesome, just a little too small. I got one size bigger than I usually wear and they are just a little snug. Great shoes though.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Lamas

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe but runs very small, buy several sizes up
customer_reviews.text: I am a size 10 in women's. I ordered a size 13 and my toes were getting crammed at the front, so I exchanged for a 15. Amazon's exchange/return system is fantastic, by the way. Very quick and easy. The 15 fits just how I need it to. So, from a 10 to a 15 is a big jump, but at least it fits and it's very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Alissa Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love em
customer_reviews.text: These dance boots fit amazing and are my favourite pit to date!
customer_reviews.author: jonathan knowles

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Shoe were too small not sure if I ordered the right size for my son.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda  G. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: The sizing on these runs somewhat small. Luckily we ...
customer_reviews.text: The sizing on these runs somewhat small. Luckily we ordered them much larger. The price for a canvas boot seems too expensive. We were in a bind & they worked for what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Wrong item shipped
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the canvas (vegan) booties but received the shorter style in leather, so the item was completely wrong. Also, I am a 8.5-9.0 female and based on the other reviews sized up to 10. The shoes were huge on me. I would have probably fit a lot better in my original size. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Babsi

customer_reviews.title: Run small, but good dance shoes
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son - he wears a men's 9 1/2. I bought both 14 and 15. While they suggest size 14 for a men's 10, it was too small. I'm glad I ordered the 15 too. Other than that, they were great. He wore them for his performance of the Cowardly Lion in Wizard of Oz. the we're perfect with his costume.
customer_reviews.author: laurajean

customer_reviews.title: fit great.
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery, was told to order 2 sizes bigger, fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Kari Gentry

customer_reviews.title: it fits just fine. Bottom padding designed for normal
customer_reviews.text: Pay attention the the size you order, it fits just fine. Bottom padding designed for normal, not wide feet.
customer_reviews.author: Jeovanny Paredes

customer_reviews.title: Use the order guide!  Order One FULL size larger than normal.
customer_reviews.text: Use the order guide! Order One FULL size larger than normal. Thankfully I did before purchase. I normally wear a 6 - 6.5 shoe and normally order a 7 in boots.... BUT I was advised by a cast mate that these run SMALL. I ordered an 8, and with the light insert (to add heel cushion, since the heel will "bite" into your foot) it fits well. A tiny bit long in the toe, but better than too short. It has served me well for this production, and should see more shows. :)
customer_reviews.author: LittleD

customer_reviews.title: These dance shoes are great for everyday use too
customer_reviews.text: These dance shoes are great for everyday use too. I would not wear them all day on concrete but I love these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Myra Maines

customer_reviews.title: Sized way too small.
customer_reviews.text: I wear a street shoe size 7. This is my third pair of this jazz shoe, and I ordered a size 10 (for the second time). This is BARELY big enough to dance in. My advice is to order 3 sizes larger than your street shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Village Gypsy

customer_reviews.title: 2" too small
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two sized larger and they were still two inches short!
customer_reviews.author: Kris W.

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes works for a musical
customer_reviews.text: There are Good shoes and I assume they will last a Long time. They are also very nicely made, and came on time.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and fits great. I am a little worried about the heel being uncomfortable. But we shall see soon!
customer_reviews.author: Kingy47

customer_reviews.title: I love them, I got the size 9 which fit ...
customer_reviews.text: I love them, I got the size 9 which fit pretty good, flexible when I dance and easy to point my toes I love them !!!
customer_reviews.author: N.C.

customer_reviews.title: Its ok not really worth it considering the prize.
customer_reviews.text: Well the shoes aren't fitted to size, and when in a wood floor they slip way to often. But they look great and provide you with great flexibility to your feet. But the seem in the back hurts when your in the bar. Great leather on the heel looks like they will last long.
customer_reviews.author: Kassandra Eisenhart

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Great for jazz! P.s. Quite slippery on some floors!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and breathable. I can dance and move as much as I can. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: ... two sizes above typical shoe size not one as recommended by Sansha
customer_reviews.text: Needed two sizes above typical shoe size not one as recommended by Sansha. Will be trying a size 11.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

product_meta.title: SANSHA Soho Lace-Up Jazz Shoe
product_meta.description:
This jazz boot from Sansha will have you performing your best. The Soho features a lightweight canvas upper, a lace-up front, and a split suede sole for maximum flexibility.

In 1982, Franck Raoul-Duval, a 25-year-old Frenchman with a passion for dance and Russian history, created a new type of ballet shoe. After numerous trials and adjustments, he came up with an innovation that changed the lives of dancers everywhere. The split-sole ballet slipper, with its glove-like fit, was born. Sansha now manufactures an extensive range of dance shoes for everything from ballet to jazz, hip-hop to flamenco, and ballroom to tap. Sansha collaborates with dance professionals, teachers and store owners to remain a prominent brand in the dance capitals of the world.
feature_bullets: Women should select one size up from street shoe, men's size is accurate to street shoe
